Package org.gradle.tooling.events.test

Interface JvmTestOperationDescriptor

All Superinterfaces:
OperationDescriptor, TestOperationDescriptor
public interface JvmTestOperationDescriptor extends TestOperationDescriptor
Describes a test that runs on the JVM and for which an event has occurred. At least a suite name, class name, or method name is available for each JVM test.
Since:
2.4
